### Package Development {-}

#### Folder Structure {-}

```
package_name
	package_name
	    __init__.py
		Module1.py
		tests
			module1_test.py
	LICENSE
	README.md
	setup.py
	config.yaml
```

#### Install locally packages {-}

1. Navigate to the package directory (the upper most package folder, which contains the setup.py file)
2. Type `pip install -e .`
